text: Lortkipanidze () is a Georgian surname. Notable persons with that name include: *Archil Lortkipanidze (born 1970), Georgian fencer *Mariam Lortkipanidze (1922–2018), Soviet and Georgian historian *Vazha Lortkipanidze (born 1949), Georgian politician ==See also== * Lortkipanidze, a Georgian noble family Category:Georgian-language surnames
title: Lortkipanidze (surname)
